subject: Re: [junit] nightly build feature
msgSnippet: Write tests and code,...write an Ant script to run all the tests,...schedule the ant script to run nightly. ... From: akshitija  Does
messageBody:
Write tests and code,...write an Ant script to run all the tests,...schedule the ant script to run nightly.

-------------- Original message --------------
From: "akshitija" <akshitija@...>

Does Junit has any feature called nightly build feature ? Which will
run everynight & will identify the issues if any from newly developed
code?
If not then is there a way to achieve this?
Thanks
Kshitija
